description: Mayumi is a heterochromatic-eyed girl in Rin`s class who is always looking for news. At 77 centimetres, she has the smallest bust size in the series, beaten even by lolita characters such as Primula and Tsubomi. Nonetheless, she takes pride in her small breasts, rationalising that by being below average they are a rarity sought after by a select group of men.
name: Mayumi Thyme
